items.title: Score this Qi2 15W 3-in-1 station to charge your Apple everyday carry while it’s just $18 (50% off)
items.summary:
ESR 15W Qi2 3-in-1 charging station

Buy for $18 (Reg. $36.50)

Enter promo code I9NCH4GV for $17.99 off.

What we love

You’ll come across plenty of Qi2-certified chargers on the market – including some of the newer 25W Qi2.2 options – but it’s rare to find one with such a steep discount. This is easily among the most affordable Qi2 chargers around at the moment, and it offers a 15W Qi2 wireless pad with MagSafe support for your iPhone, along with dedicated spots to charge your Apple Watch and AirPods. It’s a solid charging station overall for Apple users looking to get a new charging station up and running at their desk.

items.title: Bolivia Supreme Court orders release of ex-President Anez
items.summary: LA PAZ (Reuters) -Bolivia's Supreme Court ordered the release of former president Jeanine Anez on Wednesday, following several years of preventive detention linked to legal proceedings stemming from her interim administration in 2019, Supreme Court Justice Romer Saucedo said. items.title: From Pokrovsk defenders: drones alone can't hold embattled Ukrainian city
items.summary: KYIV/EASTERN UKRAINE, Ukraine (Reuters) -As buildings change hands in chaotic fighting in Ukraine's eastern stronghold of Pokrovsk, defending forces said this week that drones alone could not hold off Russian advances and more soldiers were needed to prevent the enemy infiltrating further. items.title: Score a deal on Donkey Kong Bananza for Switch 2 + price drops on Zelda, Kirby, more
items.summary:
After selling out quite quickly, Woot has now brought back its back its deal on physical copies of Donkey Kong Bananza for Switch 2. You can now grab what is thus regraded as one of, if not, the best Switch 2 exclusive games down at $61.99 Prime shipped from the regular $70 list. That might not seem like a huge discount, and we have yet to get official word on Nintendo’s Black Friday plans, but I don’t think anyone expects to see official price drops on this one for the holidays (at least not from Nintendo). 

  • Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Switch 2 Edition $63 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Switch 2 Edition $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Mario Kart World $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World $70 (Reg. $80)

items.title: SK hynix’s Platinum series M.2 NVMe SSDs with speeds up to 14,700MB/s are now seeing huge discounts starting at $70
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black November sale, Newegg is offering some notable markdowns on SK hynix’s Platinum series M.2 NVMe SSDs. Both the Platinum P41 Gen 4 and the Platinum P51 Gen 5 drives are discounted right now, and the prices for these start at $69.99 shipped. You can score the 1TB Platinum P51 Gen 5 SSD for $109.99 shipped once you enter promo code EPE876 during checkout. This particular SSD typically goes for $170, so you’re looking at a straight-up $60 discount on it at the moment. Today’s deal at Newegg marks the return of the lowest price we first tracked for this variant at Amazon during the recent fall Prime Day sale. Similarly, the 2TB variant of the Platinum P51 SSD is down at $189.99 shipped with promo code BNAE352. Additionally, we’ve highlighted deals on the Gen 4 Platinum P41 drives if you’d rather get your hands on those, so be sure to check them out after getting more details below.

more…
